title: Display AppCache results in network inspector
body:
This feature raises the visibility of requests that hit the AppCache by explicitly calling them out as AppCache hits.

Proposed Design
- Cache hits will be tag as "coming from AppCache" in the received column
- The body of responses coming from the cache will be tag as "coming from AppCache" in the response body tab

comments.body: +1 (I'd vote for this but I'm out of votes)
